title: Lawyers Who Advanced Trump’s Election Challenges Return for Midterms
description: Donald Trump’s push to overturn his 2020 loss was roundly rejected by courts. Now dozens of lawyers who argued the cases are working for Republican campaigns and groups.
media:credit: T.J. Kirkpatrick for The New York Times
media:description: After the 2020 election, some lawyers spent months arguing cases based on groundless accusations and dubious legal theories in pressing to overturn the result.
